name: WakeUp! (itch) (Otwald)
description:
To early to wake up? Just turn the Alarm off

I know it barely counts as a game but well intention was more to just make something. Made for the Beansjam22 , with the topic " Wir müssen wach bleiben" but since i am a little Rebell, lets sleep

Controlls :

A and D or Mouse Left and Mouse Right

Credits:

ColorPalette Made by Luis Miguel Maldonado

Challenges: 

SoftwareHippie = Github is public and linked

Rebellion = Weiter schlafen ist das Ziel

Zwei Knöpfe sind mehr als genug = a und d sind die Main Controll
